verses.roman:
ekadina śacī-devī putrere bhartsiyā
dharibāre gelā, putra gelā palāiyā

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; śacī-devī—mother Śacī; putrere—unto the son; bhartsiyā—rebuking; dharibāre—to catch Him; gelā—went; putra—the son; gelā—went; palāiyā—running away.
translation: One day mother Śacī went to catch her son, wanting to rebuke Him, but He fled from the spot.
